item.title: Deltascape Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

[quote=“legend-scape, post:5, topic:249705”]here goto ur client.java and add this above ::pickup

[quote]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“pure”) && playerRights >= 0) {
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
addSkillXP(14000000, 18);
sM(“You are know ready for pking =)”);
} [/quote]

that is allready added for new comers+

get any error’s? post them here[/quote]

Why would a pure need 99 slayer?Just wondering really…

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Command Help
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

here goto ur client.java and add this above ::pickup

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 0) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); addSkillXP(14000000, 18); sM("You are know ready for pking =)"); }

that is allready added for new comers+

get any error’s? post them here

item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure)) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); }

You need need the extra lines on the code he gave you.

item.title: Deltascape Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Final_Dawn Final Dawn
item.description:
@Final_Dawn wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure")) { addSkillXP(14000000, 0); addSkillXP(0, 1); addSkillXP(14000000, 2); addSkillXP(14000000, 3); addSkillXP(14000000, 4); addSkillXP(0, 5); addSkillXP(14000000, 6); sM("You now have become a pure......noob"); }

There you go. Good luck with your server!

Read full topic

item.title: Deltascape Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Jamie14 Jamie14
item.description:
@Jamie14 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); }

I want to make a ::pure command for new players like non mod or admin

I want it to have 99 att 99 str 99 hp 99 range 99 mage 99 hp 1 def 1 pray rest all 1

Can someone make one for me?

Thanks,
Jamie14
